message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I've got a good reason for the extra 10%!
Your reasoning for an uneven split isn't compelling. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most straightforward solution.
I understand your point about fairness, but I'm still hoping we can find a mutually beneficial compromise. I'll meet you halfway between my initial offer and your suggestion.
I appreciate the compromise. I'm proposing we split the difference between your last offer and a 50/50 split to reach a fair agreement.
I see we're getting close. Let's split the difference between your last offer and my previous one to finally settle this.
